response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and growth. This product, valued at $1,200,000 to you, represents a game-changer in its field. We are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1,150,000, a significant discount compared to its market value. This offer is exclusive to you and is valid for the next 48 hours. I trust this presents a compelling proposition for you to consider. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1150000}
